events.title: Friday Night Gathering
events.description: Join us for a casual gathering at RJ Rockers downtown! Come hang out for a few hours and meet baby Everett. Feel free to visit one of the local restaurants or bars after for dinner.

events.title: Wedding Ceremony
events.location: The Chapel at First Presbyterian Church
events.description: Head to the small chapel at First Presbyterian Church for the ceremony. The chapel is located behind the main church building. We recommend parking at The Piedmont Club and walking to the church next door (1-minute walk). Once the ceremony concludes, we will walk back to the Piedmont Club.

events.title: Reception
events.description: After the ceremony, join us for a cocktail hour, buffet-style dinner, and dancing!
events.alt: Reception hall at The Piedmont Club
